projects.name: Misty Blunch's Portfolio v2
projects.description: High-accessibility portfolio built with industry best practices and a strong focus on user experience. Includes multi-language support (i18n), theme management, and fluid animations for an immersive navigation experience.

projects.name: Elegimos.pe
projects.description: Political data analysis platform for the 2021 Elections featuring complex filters and a computer vision module for facial emotional recognition of candidates.

projects.name: Misty Blunch's Portfolio v1
projects.description: My initial exploration into frontend architectures and responsive design. Features a native internationalization implementation without external frameworks.

projects.name: Leauty Web Scraping
projects.description: Data extraction tool designed to optimize academic resource searches. Transforms raw data from Libgen into an intuitive and efficient interface.
